content: the betty hair ribbon is the perfect quick crochet project for using up scraps of yarn styling this cute ribbon is endless tie to a bag handle or style in your hair for a unique touch this crochet pattern includes many different options throughout the pattern making this scarf totally customizable to your style preferences this crochet hair ribbon can be customized 3 different ways with clear instructions throughout the pattern for each the ends choose between a tapered end or a pointed end length in the pattern i have written two different lengths of course you can definitely make your own length as well border i love the feminine touch the scallop border adds to the ribbon but if you are seeking something more simple and minimal the plain border adds a clean finish
